com.isotrol.impe3.pms.gui.client.error
Class ServiceErrorsProcessor

java.lang.Object
  com.isotrol.impe3.pms.gui.client.error.ServiceErrorsProcessor

public class ServiceErrorsProcessor
extends Object

There are service errors that need more processing than simply displaying an alert window. NoSessionException is such an error, and it may be thrown during the call to any service. This class contains the processing logic for all PMS exceptions, once the particular message is resolved by an IErrorMessageResolver. All calls to AsyncCallback#onFailure(Throwable) should delegate to processError(Throwable, String)

Author:
Andrei Cojocaru

Method Detail

processError

public void processError(Throwable error,
                         IErrorMessageResolver emr,
                         String opMessage)
Processes the message and the error. Once the message is created, shows a modal alert popup with the complete error message. If the error is a NoSessionException, the browser reloads the page when popup gets closed.

Parameters:
error - the thrown error.
emr - the Error Message Resolver maps exceptions on human-readable messages. May be null; in this case, the message displayed will be opMessage
opMessage - message that describes only the operation. Must be passed to the EMR in order to obtain the complete error message.

Injects the utilities object
